name: Fast Braking
description:
Use the arrow keys to navigate menus and enter to select options.
Use the up arrow keys to speed up and use the down arrow key to slow down.

In this game you need to go as fast as you can before hitting the wall. The faster you go and the closer to the wall you stop the more money you make.

Use the money you earn to upgrade either the engine or brakes of your car so you can drive faster or brake harder.
